locale.message: The PKP PN plugin will deposit your published content into the PKP Preservation Network for preservation.

PKP Preservation Network

Please read the overview of the PKP PN and complete this simple form. This option will enable inclusion of your journal in the Public Knowledge Project Preservation Network (PKP PN).
The PKP PN plugin has been enabled.
The PKP PN plugin has been disabled.
The PKP PN plugin requires either the Acron plugin or a periodic scheduling tools such as 'cron.'
As Journal Manager, I, in good faith, accept and confirm the following terms and conditions for participation in the Public Knowledge Project Preservation Network (PKP-PKP PN):
This is your journal's unique identifier for the PKP PN. You may need to share this with PKP PN administrators for support purposes.
If for some reason there are no terms listed above or you know these terms have been updated, click Refresh to update the terms listed above.
Please choose an deposit object type.
Please choose a deposit object threshold.
Agreement to the network's terms of use is required in order to deposit to the PKP PN.
The PKP PN deposit statuses are described here.
Are you sure you want to reset this deposit? It will be repackaged and resent to the processing server.
The PKP PN is not currently accepting deposits.
The PKP PN is accepting deposits.
Check the status of your deposits.
Your journal must have an ISSN to deposit content to the PKP PN.
There was an error connecting to the PKP PN - please contact your system administrator.
The PKP PN terms of use have been updated. Agreement with new terms is required to continue depositing.
CURL support must be enabled to proceed.
ZipArchive support must be enabled to proceed.

Your journal must have an ISSN before you can agree to the terms of service. You can enter the ISSN on the Journal Settings page. Once the journal ISSN is entered, the terms of service will be shown below.
Your system must have a tar executable.
The Archive_Tar PHP extension must be installed before the PKP PN can be enabled.
